post.author: ZippyDSMlee
post.body:
Ok stupid(me) has managed to add weapon upgrades to the store, but I have not managed to add shroud upgrades but I can add them through weapons, anyway to get them to show in the shroud power pages? 0-o

Would like to make a temporary silencer(time or shot based) so the level 2 can be better than it and add accuracy.

Would like to have soldiers drop gold of some kind or sale off weapons that can not be re got unless you pick them up(press IE use to pick them up) in the filed.

What controls screen boobing(weapon kick?)? ....itdose get annoying now and then.

I can't seem to adjust a Scribes HP right is there a scale value somewhere in its def that makes them weak?


I have some things messed with, check out my test mod. Beign in the viel no longer drains energy but it wont re generate when tis on, you can still use pools to recharge it. Changes gravity a bit need to change grenade mass...lol tossing them across a level is fun tho!


http://zippydsmlee.wordpress.com/wp-adm ... &message=1

Weapon fire rate and the resell value in the store seem hard coded.....

post.author: Dafama2k7
post.body:
How can i open the in game console on the new Wolfenstein, please ???

I can do it on any IdTech4 game, like Doom 3, Quake 4, Prey or ETQW, but how i can do it on the new Wolfy ???


Thank you in advance.
